scripts.release:patch: pnpm run build && pnpm test && pnpm version patch && git push && git push --tags && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run build && pnpm test && pnpm version minor && git push && git push --tags && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.release:replace: pnpm run build && pnpm test && git push && git push --tags && pnpm publish --access public
